languages.text: "Мой статус старшего офицера освободил меня от задержания, но на семью привилегия не распространяется — их арестовали вместе с другими членами клана".
"My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."
languages.original_text: "Мой статус старшего офицера освободил меня от задержания, но на семью привилегия не распространяется — их арестовали вместе с другими членами клана".

traits.locale_text: "My senior officer's status excused me from being arrested, but the privilege did not extend to them — they were taken along with the rest of the clan."
"My senior officer's status excused me from being arrested, but the privilege did not extend to them — they were taken along with the rest of the clan."
"My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."
"My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."
"My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."
"My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

languages.text: « Mon statut d'officier supérieur m'a évité l'arrestation, mais ce privilège ne s'étend pas à ma famille, raison pour laquelle elles ont été appréhendées avec le reste du clan. »
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

traits.locale_text: « Mon statut d'officier supérieur m'a évité l'arrestation, mais ce privilège ne s'étend pas à ma famille, raison pour laquelle elles ont été appréhendées avec le reste du clan. »

languages.text: «Mi estatus como oficial de alto rango evitó que me arrestaran, pero el privilegio no se extiende a ellas. Fueron arrestadas junto al resto del clan».
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

traits.locale_text: «Mi estatus como oficial de alto rango evitó que me arrestaran, pero el privilegio no se extiende a ellas. Fueron arrestadas junto al resto del clan».

languages.text: “我是高阶军官，因此并没有被捕，但我的家人并没有同样的特权。他们和其他的氏族成员一起被带走了。”
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

traits.locale_text: “我是高阶军官，因此并没有被捕，但我的家人并没有同样的特权。他们和其他的氏族成员一起被带走了。”

languages.text: 「私は上級士官として逮捕を免れたが、彼らにはこのような特権はなく…彼らは他の一族とともに連行された」
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

traits.locale_text: 「私は上級士官として逮捕を免れたが、彼らにはこのような特権はなく…彼らは他の一族とともに連行された」

languages.text: "Mein Status als leitender Offizier hat verhindert, dass ich verhaftet wurde. Doch für sie gilt dieses Privileg nicht. Sie wurden zusammen mit dem Rest des Clans inhaftiert."
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Status als leitender Offizier hat verhindert, dass ich verhaftet wurde. Doch für sie gilt dieses Privileg nicht. Sie wurden zusammen mit dem Rest des Clans inhaftiert."

languages.text: "Kıdemli subay mevkim, beni tutuklanmaktan muaf tutuyor. Ancak bu ayrıcalık onları kapsamıyor. Klanın geri kalanıyla birlikte gözaltına alındılar."
languages.original_text: "My status as senior officer exempted me from being arrested, but that same privilege did not extend to them — they were taken, along with the rest of the clan."
